text: Marius Ștefănescu (born 14 August 1998) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Liga I side Sepsi OSK Sfântu Gheorghe. == Career Statistics == === Club === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%; text- align: center;" ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="2" |League ! colspan="2" |Cup ! colspan="2" |Europe ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="3" |KSE Tg.Secuiesc |2017-18 |25 |5 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |25 |5 |- |2018-19 |28 |10 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |28 |10 |- !Total !53 !15 !0 !0 !0 !0 !0 !0 !53 !15 |- | rowspan="3" |OSK Sepsi |2019-20 |28 |3 |6 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |34 |3 |- |2020-21 |7 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |7 |0 |- !Total !35 !3 !6 !0 !0 !0 !0 !0 !41 !3 |- ! colspan="2" |Career Total !88 !18 !6 !0 !0 !0 !0 !0 !94 !18 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liga I players Category:Sepsi OSK Sfântu Gheorghe players
